## setShaderDefine() function

Sets new value of 'define' regardless of current value set.

Update `defines` map with new key and value, if key is already occupied it overrides its value. Helper function that may be used to setup \[\[THREE.ShaderMaterialParameters\]\] before material is create (i.e. in c-tor).

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function setShaderDefine(defines: {
    [key: string]: any;
}, key: string, value: boolean | number): boolean;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  defines | { \[key: string\]: any; } | Shader <code>defines</code> stored in key-value map. |
|  key | string | The key used to identify \_define\_. |
|  value | boolean \| number | The value to be stored. |

<b>Returns:</b>

boolean

\[\[true\]\] if define has actually changed, false is stayed the same.  setShaderMaterialDefine.
